title: Add result tracking to Install-WingetPackage
description: Wrap Install-WingetPackage calls to capture success/failure and update global counters. Return structured result object.

title: CRITICAL: Add configuration schema validation
description: Validate config.yml against expected types on load. Check hostname=string, ssh_port=int, install_*=bool, package_managers.*=bool. Report all errors before failing. Catch misconfigurations early.

title: HIGH: Document module dependencies and load order
description: Document all 11 PowerShell modules with dependencies and load order. Mark which are idempotent vs one-time. Include Mermaid dependency graph. Help users understand re-run safety.

title: Add installation result counters to Run.ps1
description: Track installation results (attempted/succeeded/failed/skipped) per package. Add script-scope hashtable in Run.ps1 with counters and helper functions Add-InstallResult, Get-InstallResults. Foundation for error reporting.

title: MEDIUM: Add troubleshooting guide
description: Common errors and solutions for ROG Ally (winget, GitHub auth, package failures) and Steam Deck (read-only fs, Decky rate limits, SD card). Include debug mode, log locations, re-run instructions.

title: Add Write-Summary function for installation results
description: Create function that outputs formatted summary at end of run: X installed, Y failed, Z skipped. List failed packages with error messages.

title: CRITICAL: Add post-installation health checks
description: Verify key packages installed after run (Steam, git, SSH). Check service status (sshd, Tailscale). Test network connectivity. Report pass/fail with suggested fixes for failures.

title: MEDIUM: Add architecture and flow diagrams
description: Mermaid diagrams for: bootstrap flow (both platforms), config merge flow, module dependencies, device detection logic. Each <12 nodes, render on GitHub. Link from README.

title: HIGH: Add structured JSON logging
description: Replace transcript-only logging with structured JSONL. Create logging.ps1 with Write-Log function. One JSON object per line with timestamp, level, message, context. Enable parse-friendly log analysis.

title: HIGH: Add integration tests for Windows modules
description: Pester integration tests with mocked winget/git. Cover Install-WingetPackage success/failure/fallback, config merging priority, git auth handling. At least 10 test cases, all pass in CI.
